title: Effect of insecticide treatment on plant growth 1

content.question: Identify the control treatment in the original experiment. Provide reasoning to support the researcher’s decision to not use a set of unsprayed plants as a control.

frqParts.text: Identify the control treatment in the original experiment. Provide reasoning to support the researcher’s decision to not use a set of unsprayed plants as a control.

skill.text: 3.C: Identify experimental procedures that align with the question, including: i. identifying dependent and independent variables ii. identifying appropriate controls iii. justifying appropriate controls
